overview: Friends Franz and Bela work in a deli belonging to Mr. Wallis.  Franz is the manager and Bela a salesclerk.  Both get to know the lovely Lilo.  But while Bela is rebuffed, the charming womanizer Franz is more successful.  After a boisterous celebration in the deli, Mr. Wallis tells Franz to get lost and hires Lilo as a new salesperson.  Franz and Bela take a job at Mr. Markow's deli across the street and a serious competition begins between the two delis for survival.
title: Delikatessen
